mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (email, password, nickname, profile_image_url, login_format, created_at, updated_at, terms_and_conditions, adult_yn, review_completed_yn) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{loginFormat}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{termsAndConditions}, #{adultYn}, #{reviewCompletedYn})
